## Form.alert() method

Popup a message

**Signature:**

```typescript
alert(msg: string, title: string, level?: Level): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  msg | string | The message to display. |
|  title | string | The title of the popup. |
|  level | [Level](./forms42core.level.md) | _(Optional)_ The level of the message (optional). |

**Returns:**

void
